Trigger.name: Flamewhip
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == "you" then system.hunting.vars.targetName = matches[3] system.hunting.vars.attacking = true end
if system.hunting.funcs.isHuntingTarget(matches[3]) then system.hunting.funcs.razeShield() end

regexCodeList.string: ^A whip of liquid flame coalesces in (you)r hand, and with a savage lash you send it to scourge the flesh of (.+)\.$
^A whip of flame coalesces in the hand of (\w+), which \w+ brings around in a savage lashing motion to scourge the flesh of (.+)\.$
